gameDetails.description:
This promo pack includes 30 Treasure chits and 12 Omen tiles, allowing for greater strategic variety and replayability. Customize the game’s calendar setup with up to 8,000 possible configurations while keeping the same thrilling historical events. Elevate your Pax Hispanica experience with new twists and endless possibilities!

—description from the publisher
